description:

1 - Cleanup current site to closely match old site where possible (sjhp.org vs beta.sjhp.org)
2 - Convert banners currently on drupal to wordpress
3 - Create landing pages for adword campaigns
4 - Increase download speed
5 - Tie in facebook updates to website updates
6 - The new wordpress theme doesn’t have to match exactly but we’d like to keep the color schemes and navigation menus.
Their overall goal is to increase donations, public awareness of our free programs and volunteer recruitment.

description:
The organization is looking for someone who has the creativity and energy to develop a poster and the design for the program booklet for The Earth 2100 Conference. They would like to have a completed poster and program booklet in 3-4 weeks. 
Key tasks:
1 - To create a poster for The Earth 2100 Conference
2 - To design a program booklet for the Earth 2100 Conference

The goal is to give young people a voice, a chance to explain how they would manage human affairs on Earth and to make a global appeal to older generations to work
skills:
A strong interest and support for the work of Our Task
Graphic Design
Graphic Design / Print
Communications skills
title: Graphic Designer Volunteer for Conference Poster

1 - Performs a variety of marketing-related tasks under supervision including development of collateral materials, direct mail campaigns and events
2 - Writes, formats and edits internal and external materials, including printed and web materials, conference materials and other publications
3 - Uses desktop publishing and related software/hardware to design and develop attractive formats supportive of the organization's mission for all printed materials including marketing brochures, fundraising materials, grant applications, newsletters, posters, advertisements, etc.

description:
Organization needs someone who does the following activities:

1 - Work with staff to project manage and execute social media marketing activities.
2 - Manage Chris Elliott Fund and Founder’s campaigns on Facebook, Twitter, Linked In and other social networks; posting cool links, uploading videos and pictures, responding to comments, and interacting with CEF’s online community in a timely and professional manner
3 - Monitor and improve CEF’s online reputation on social media, directory, blogs and review sites (e.g. Yelp) using Google Alerts and other tools
4 - Provide creative input to help develop marketing strategies for CEF
5 - Update content, images and information on CEF’s website
6 - Experiment with new web and social media tactics and platforms, and stay up-to-date on the latest technologies
7 - Manage SEO and keyword density analysis and tracking
8 - Conduct market research, analyze information and develop recommendations
9 - Provide administrative support to the Executive Director as needed
skills:
Advertising
Marketing Analytics
Brand Development & Messaging
Marketing & Communications (Mar/Com)
Marketing Strategy & Planning
Sales Marketing
title: Social Media Marketing Coordinator

description:
Organization needs someone who coordinates and implements marketing strategies involving the following activities:

-Attends all meetings of the Organization at least weekly.
-Must support and maintain mission goal and statement of organization.
-Build and maintain relationships with resources and/or referrals/ other companies
-Ability to set daily, weekly, and monthly goals which will encourage growth for the organization.
-Effectively maintain and manage a marketing budget consistently referring to Marketing Manager or President of the organization.
-Create, deliver, and optimize marketing materials.
-Research media coverage and the industry’s trend.
-Developing continuous stories for the AFB
-Producing additional marketing communications such as flyers, posters, stamps, exhibition-related projects.
-Produce clear and concise written correspondence in the form of letters, emails, etc.
- Assisting team members with day to day marketing tasks and coordinating marketing projects and activities as requested.

description:
Organization needs someone who does the following activities:

Develop and maintain positive relationships with members of the media, trade associations and constituent groups
Work with media outlets to publish timely company information, such as press releases, brochures, and other materials
Ensure communication strategy is consistent and reflects CEF’s strategic vision
Work with Social Media Marketing Coordinator to develop and implement social media strategies
Produce and publish mass communications with email blasts and marketing campaigns
Refine core messaging to ensure organizational consistency in all aspects of communication
Create or uncover opportunities for CEF spokespeople to engage directly with the media including interviews, speaking engagements, and panels
Develop CEF media materials including press kit, backgrounder, executive bios, Q&As, talking points, etc.
Document presence of CEF spokespeople at events, conferences, and speaking engagements
Advocate on behalf of the CEF brand with external stakeholders and the media across all communications channels and vehicles
Collaborate with PR/marketing agency to develop the advertising, marketing and promotion plans
Write business letters, emails and other business communications as needed
skills:
Excellent written and public speaking skills
Project management skills with the ability to meet deadlines and work under pressure
Problem solving and decision making skills
Strong organizational skills with a detail orientation
Professional demeanor with a client-focused orientation
Strong interpersonal skills and ability to form relationships
Advanced knowledge of Windows-based applications including PowerPoint, Excel and Word.
Experience with social media platforms and technologies including Facebook, Twitter, Linked In and YouTube
Creativity and marketing savvy
title: External Communication Coordinator

2- Provide creative input on book design
3- Professionalism regarding time, cost considerations, and deadlines
4- Work as part of a team with authors
skills:
Graphic Design skills
Must be proficient in Adobe
Communication skills
title: Graphic Designer/ Layout Artist

description:
Organization is seeking an individual with Social Media Management experience to join our volunteer leadership team. The ideal volunteer will possess the following:

1. Create simple infographics (some simply bullets of tips to save money or processes of no more than 4 steps typically)

We have a story ready to use as our first infographic.

description:
Organization is looking for a coding volunteer with experience in PHP to help them integrate interactive features into their Wordpress website. In particular, they wish to create features that facilitate social media sharing of their exhibition content and empower people to take real action in their lives. For example, each artwork in the exhibition would be associated with a small list of pledges such as the following:

Pledge to cut off junk mail. Pledge to eliminate purchases of bottled water. Pledge to turn off all lights and electronics when not in use.
They would like the visitor to be able to select one or more pledges from the list, select one or more of their social media networks (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, Google+) and be able to share their pledges, along with the associated artwork, with their social media followers.
